Package objets

Class Triangle

java.lang.Object
objets.Triangle
All Implemented Interfaces:
IObjetScene
public class Triangle extends Object implements IObjetScene
Represents a triangle object in the 3D scene.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    Triangle(Point a, Point b, Point c)
    Creates a new Triangle object with three specified points.

    • Triangle

      public Triangle(Point a, Point b, Point c)
      Creates a new Triangle object with three specified points.
      Parameters:
      a - The origin point of the triangle.
      b - The second point of the triangle.
      c - The third point of the triangle.

    • getRayon

      public double getRayon()
      Gets the radius of the triangle (not used for triangles).
      Returns:
      The radius of the triangle (always 0 for triangles).

    • getN

      public Vector getN(Point p)
      Computes the normal vector for the triangle.
      Specified by:
      getN in interface IObjetScene
      Parameters:
      p - The point on the triangle's surface (not used in the computation).
      Returns:
      The normalized normal vector for the triangle, which is the cross product of vectors AB and AC.

    • intersection

      public double intersection(Point lookFrom, Vector d)
      Calculates the intersection of a ray with the triangle.
      Specified by:
      intersection in interface IObjetScene
      Parameters:
      lookFrom - The starting point of the ray.
      d - The direction vector of the ray.
      Returns:
      The distance along the ray to the intersection point, or -1 if no intersection occurs.
